item.description:
poker night texas hold'em! Open to other types but this is a fun & easy going game!

only $10 buy in. Usually just 1 time for the night.  We usually end by 9:30-10pm by raising blinds in a timely fashion, because it is a week day event!

LIMITED SPACE: only can accomodate 7-9 players and we have 3-4 regulars already.

Plus $1 donation for the organizer.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Poker Tournament at Darlene's Place in Bristol
